name: Beseech the Queen
oracle_text: ({2/B} can be paid with any two mana or with {B}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Search your library for a card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of lands you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Those who hear her go mad with inspiration.

name: Cabal Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.

name: Conflux
oracle_text: Search your library for a white card, a blue card, a black card, a red card, and a green card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"It's self-indulgent, I admit, but I do like to watch my own symphony play itself out."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Dark Depths
oracle_text: Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.
{3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths.
When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible named Marit Lage.

name: Glissa, the Traitor
oracle_text: First strike, deathtouch
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Once Mirrodin's brightest hope. Now Phyrexia's dark champion.

name: Helvault
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Exile target creature you control.
{7}, {T}: Exile target creature you don't control.
When Helvault is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

name: Memnarch
oracle_text: {1}{U}{U}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
{3}{U}: Gain control of target artifact. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor_text: "An imperfection in the perfect world? We can't allow that."

name: Mind's Desire
oracle_text: Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

name: Momir Vig, Simic Visionary
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a green creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card and reveal it. If you do, shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever you cast a blue creature spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put that card into your hand.

name: Near-Death Experience
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.
flavor_text: Lands ravaged, cities in ruins, so many lives sacrificed, and yet there was no other word for it but victory.

name: Obliterate
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

name: Phyrexian Processor
oracle_text: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

name: Tolaria West
oracle_text: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Umezawa's Jitte
oracle_text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte.
Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one —
• Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• You gain 2 life.
Equip {2}

name: Unmask
oracle_text: You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
